scope.title: DEV Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
scope.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!

frontMatter.title: DEV Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
frontMatter.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!
